titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2557) to provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct various projects for improvements to rivers and harbors of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-282, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 105.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 375.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/24/2003--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2557 (Water Resources Development Act of 2003).
